content.raw:
It appears that some services are not being advertised.  To reproduce, follow the custom control tutorial.

The controller will hang will waiting for services:

roslaunch subt\_seed x1.launch robot\_name:=X1  
... logging to /home/kevin/.ros/log/d309c128-d334-11e9-8afb-7085c2c3ff36/roslaunch-kevin-i9-3020.log  
Checking log directory for disk usage. This may take awhile.  
Press Ctrl-C to interrupt  
Done checking log file disk usage. Usage is <1GB.

started roslaunch server [http://kevin-i9:42765/](http://kevin-i9:42765/)

# SUMMARY

PARAMETERS

* /rosdistro: melodic
* /rosversion: 1.14.3

NODES  
/  
X1subt\_solution \(subt\_seed/subt\_seed\_node\)

ROS\_MASTER\_URI=[http://localhost:11311](http://localhost:11311)

process\[X1subt\_solution-1\]: started with pid \[3035\]  
\[ INFO\] \[1568055993.380043099\]: Starting seed competitor

\[ INFO\] \[1568055993.383217064\]: Waiting for /clock, /subt/start, and /subt/pose\_from\_artifact  
\[ INFO\] \[1568055993.646899959, 36.744000000\]: waitForService: Service \[/subt/start\] has not been advertised, waiting...
content.html:
It appears that some services are not being advertised. To reproduce, follow the custom control tutorial.

The controller will hang will waiting for services:

roslaunch subt_seed x1.launch robot_name:=X1
... logging to /home/kevin/.ros/log/d309c128-d334-11e9-8afb-7085c2c3ff36/roslaunch-kevin-i9-3020.log
Checking log directory for disk usage. This may take awhile.
Press Ctrl-C to interrupt
Done checking log file disk usage. Usage is <1GB.

started roslaunch server http://kevin-i9:42765/

SUMMARY

PARAMETERS

  • /rosdistro: melodic
  • /rosversion: 1.14.3

NODES
/
X1subt_solution (subt_seed/subt_seed_node)

ROS_MASTER_URI=http://localhost:11311

process[X1subt_solution-1]: started with pid [3035]
[ INFO] [1568055993.380043099]: Starting seed competitor

[ INFO] [1568055993.383217064]: Waiting for /clock, /subt/start, and /subt/pose_from_artifact
[ INFO] [1568055993.646899959, 36.744000000]: waitForService: Service [/subt/start] has not been advertised, waiting...
